maintainer.name: Joshua Saddler
maintainer.longdescription: Urban Terror is a realistic terrorists vs. SWAT first-person shooter. It was originally based on the Quake3 Arena code, and now is a standalone game built on ioQuake3, a much enhanced version of the Quake3 engine by id Software.

use.flag: Add support for high-quality Ogg Vorbis sounds
